procedure.name: DeleteReservation
procedure.statement: UPDATE "CUSTOMER" SET C_BALANCE = C_BALANCE + ?, C_IATTR00 = ?, C_IATTR10 = C_IATTR10 - 1, C_IATTR11 = C_IATTR10 - 1 WHERE C_ID = ?
SELECT C_ID FROM "CUSTOMER" WHERE C_ID_STR = ?

SELECT C_SATTR00, C_SATTR02, C_SATTR04, C_IATTR00, C_IATTR02, C_IATTR04, C_IATTR06, F_SEATS_LEFT, R_ID, R_SEAT, R_PRICE, R_IATTR00 FROM "CUSTOMER", "FLIGHT", "RESERVATION" WHERE C_ID = ? AND C_ID = R_C_ID AND F_ID = ? AND F_ID = R_F_ID
UPDATE "FREQUENT_FLYER" SET FF_IATTR10 = FF_IATTR10 - 1 WHERE FF_C_ID = ? AND FF_AL_ID = ?
DELETE FROM "RESERVATION" WHERE R_ID = ? AND R_C_ID = ? AND R_F_ID = ?
UPDATE "FLIGHT" SET F_SEATS_LEFT = F_SEATS_LEFT + 1 WHERE F_ID = ?
SELECT C_ID, FF_AL_ID FROM "CUSTOMER", "FREQUENT_FLYER" WHERE FF_C_ID_STR = ? AND FF_C_ID = C_ID

procedure.name: FindFlights
procedure.statement: SELECT F_ID, F_AL_ID, F_SEATS_LEFT, F_DEPART_AP_ID, F_DEPART_TIME, F_ARRIVE_AP_ID, F_ARRIVE_TIME, AL_NAME, AL_IATTR00, AL_IATTR01 FROM "FLIGHT", "AIRLINE" WHERE F_DEPART_AP_ID = ? AND F_DEPART_TIME >= ? AND F_DEPART_TIME <= ? AND F_AL_ID = AL_ID AND F_ARRIVE_AP_ID IN (??)

SELECT F_ID, F_AL_ID, F_SEATS_LEFT, F_DEPART_AP_ID, F_DEPART_TIME, F_ARRIVE_AP_ID, F_ARRIVE_TIME, AL_NAME, AL_IATTR00, AL_IATTR01 FROM "FLIGHT", "AIRLINE" WHERE F_DEPART_AP_ID = ? AND F_DEPART_TIME >= ? AND F_DEPART_TIME <= ? AND F_AL_ID = AL_ID AND F_ARRIVE_AP_ID IN (??)

SELECT F_ID, F_AL_ID, F_SEATS_LEFT, F_DEPART_AP_ID, F_DEPART_TIME, F_ARRIVE_AP_ID, F_ARRIVE_TIME, AL_NAME, AL_IATTR00, AL_IATTR01 FROM "FLIGHT", "AIRLINE" WHERE F_DEPART_AP_ID = ? AND F_DEPART_TIME >= ? AND F_DEPART_TIME <= ? AND F_AL_ID = AL_ID AND F_ARRIVE_AP_ID IN (??)
SELECT AP_CODE, AP_NAME, AP_CITY, AP_LONGITUDE, AP_LATITUDE, CO_ID, CO_NAME, CO_CODE_2, CO_CODE_3 FROM "AIRPORT", "COUNTRY" WHERE AP_ID = ? AND AP_CO_ID = CO_ID
SELECT * FROM "AIRPORT_DISTANCE" WHERE D_AP_ID0 = ? AND D_DISTANCE <= ? ORDER BY D_DISTANCE ASC

procedure.name: FindOpenSeats
procedure.statement: SELECT F_STATUS, F_BASE_PRICE, F_SEATS_TOTAL, F_SEATS_LEFT, (F_BASE_PRICE + (F_BASE_PRICE * (1 - (F_SEATS_LEFT / F_SEATS_TOTAL)))) AS F_PRICE FROM "FLIGHT" WHERE F_ID = ?
SELECT R_ID, R_F_ID, R_SEAT FROM "RESERVATION" WHERE R_F_ID = ?

procedure.name: LoadConfig
procedure.statement: SELECT * FROM "CONFIG_PROFILE"
SELECT f_id FROM "FLIGHT" ORDER BY F_DEPART_TIME DESC LIMIT 10000
SELECT AL_ID, AL_IATA_CODE FROM "AIRLINE" WHERE AL_IATA_CODE != ''
SELECT AP_ID, AP_CODE FROM "AIRPORT"
SELECT * FROM "CONFIG_HISTOGRAMS"
SELECT CO_ID, CO_CODE_3 FROM "COUNTRY"

procedure.name: NewReservation
procedure.statement: INSERT INTO "RESERVATION" ( R_ID, R_C_ID, R_F_ID, R_SEAT, R_PRICE, R_IATTR00, R_IATTR01, R_IATTR02, R_IATTR03, R_IATTR04, R_IATTR05, R_IATTR06, R_IATTR07, R_IATTR08 ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
UPDATE "CUSTOMER" SET C_IATTR10 = C_IATTR10 + 1, C_IATTR11 = C_IATTR11 + 1, C_IATTR12 = ?, C_IATTR13 = ?, C_IATTR14 = ?, C_IATTR15 = ? WHERE C_ID = ?
SELECT R_ID FROM "RESERVATION" WHERE R_F_ID = ? AND R_C_ID = ?
SELECT F_AL_ID, F_SEATS_LEFT, "AIRLINE".* FROM "FLIGHT", "AIRLINE" WHERE F_ID = ? AND F_AL_ID = AL_ID
SELECT C_BASE_AP_ID, C_BALANCE, C_SATTR00 FROM "CUSTOMER" WHERE C_ID = ?
UPDATE "FREQUENT_FLYER" SET FF_IATTR10 = FF_IATTR10 + 1, FF_IATTR11 = ?, FF_IATTR12 = ?, FF_IATTR13 = ?, FF_IATTR14 = ? WHERE FF_C_ID = ? AND FF_AL_ID = ?
SELECT R_ID FROM "RESERVATION" WHERE R_F_ID = ? and R_SEAT = ?
UPDATE "FLIGHT" SET F_SEATS_LEFT = F_SEATS_LEFT - 1 WHERE F_ID = ?

procedure.name: UpdateCustomer
procedure.statement: UPDATE "CUSTOMER" SET C_IATTR00 = ?, C_IATTR01 = ? WHERE C_ID = ?
SELECT * FROM "CUSTOMER" WHERE C_ID = ?
SELECT C_ID FROM "CUSTOMER" WHERE C_ID_STR = ?
UPDATE "FREQUENT_FLYER" SET FF_IATTR00 = ?, FF_IATTR01 = ? WHERE FF_C_ID = ? AND FF_AL_ID = ?
SELECT * FROM "FREQUENT_FLYER" WHERE FF_C_ID = ?
SELECT * FROM "AIRPORT", "COUNTRY" WHERE AP_ID = ? AND AP_CO_ID = CO_ID

procedure.name: UpdateReservation
procedure.statement: UPDATE "RESERVATION" SET R_SEAT = ?, R_IATTR02 = ? WHERE R_ID = ? AND R_C_ID = ? AND R_F_ID = ?
UPDATE "RESERVATION" SET R_SEAT = ?, R_IATTR01 = ? WHERE R_ID = ? AND R_C_ID = ? AND R_F_ID = ?
UPDATE "RESERVATION" SET R_SEAT = ?, R_IATTR03 = ? WHERE R_ID = ? AND R_C_ID = ? AND R_F_ID = ?
SELECT R_ID FROM "RESERVATION" WHERE R_F_ID = ? AND R_C_ID = ?
SELECT R_ID FROM "RESERVATION" WHERE R_F_ID = ? and R_SEAT = ?
UPDATE "RESERVATION" SET R_SEAT = ?, R_IATTR00 = ? WHERE R_ID = ? AND R_C_ID = ? AND R_F_ID = ?

procedure.name: LoadConfig
procedure.statement: SELECT f_id FROM FLIGHT WHERE ROWNUM <= 10000 ORDER BY F_DEPART_TIME DESC

procedure.name: LoadConfig
procedure.statement: SELECT TOP 10000 f_id FROM FLIGHT ORDER BY F_DEPART_TIME DESC
